document_data.mainbody:
rondeth of the Broken Staff was a human mage.
Alongside Auziiyra Twelvestars and several other mages, Brondeth was guarding a human mining community when they were attacked by drow. The mages used the wonderform spell to hide in the form of wingless wonders and escape being killed, but became lost in the Underdark. They were thought to still be wandering the Night Below by the midâ€“14 century DR.
